hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price consolidates within 5% of 20-day high, a breakout above the 20-day high with volume > 1.5x 20-day average will signal transition from NEUTRAL to BULL regime with 85% probability of 8%+ move within 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low volatility during price consolidation near highs suggests pent-up directional energy. Regulatory clarity (MiCA, UK consultations) reduces systemic uncertainty, making decisive breakouts more likely to sustain. Volume confirmation filters false breakouts.
entry_conditions: BTC price within 5% of 20-day high for minimum 7 days
Daily close above 20-day high with volume > 1.5x 20-day average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% gain from entry or regime shifts to BULL (confirmed by regime model)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout occurs but fails to sustain >3 days or results in immediate reversal below breakout level more than 40% of instances.
